name: Process Not Responding
description:
This is the first version of the tutorial level of a game taking place inside an operating system during shutdown. One single routine will try to save all the others by finding what triggered the critical error and stoping the system from failing.

Credits : Every resource in the game is made by me except for the font, I used the free font Aldo The Apache (https://www.dafont.com/fr/aj-paglia.d2141?l[]=10&l[]=1), and the music  "The Core" (https://opengameart.org/content/core-music-futuristic) by "p0ss" (https://opengameart.org/users/p0ss)
